headline: Here’s Why Giverny Capital Asset Management Sold Its Stake in M&T Bank Corporation (MTB)
summary: Giverny Capital Asset Management, LLC, an investment management company, recently published its second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. During the first half of the year, the market was volatile. The S&P 500 ended June 30 up 6.20%. The portfolio lagged behind the market initially but gained 5.41% over […]

headline: M&T Bank adopts Amperity platform to enhance customer data management
summary: The partnership will enable M&T Bank to consolidate fragmented customer information and streamline data management.
